33990.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「風の町アズラン:
The item requested by the lord of Wind Town Azlan has already been finished. But there is no sign that he is coming
to get it. I wonder if the new wind rider has not shown up yet.

33991.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この関所で暮ら:
Enkara-san, who lives in this barrier, is a very skilled craftsman. He says he likes the wind in the valley, so he
retreats to this tiny customs house to work.

33992.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「やあやあ よく:
Hey there, how are you? This is Mountain Pass.
All the merchants coming and going between Royal City Kamiharmui and Wind Town Azlan via Inamino Highway take a rest at this pass.

33993.「おう！ アズランの領主様から\n 風のたづなの作成を頼まれたのは オレさ。\n:
Oh! I was asked by the Lord of Azlan to create the Wind Reins. That being the case, I've already finished it.
But there's no sign of the new Wind Rider coming for it, is there.

33994.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「風送りの儀に必:
The Wind Robe, another sacred object required for the Wind Sending Ceremony, is enshrined at the top of
the Sui Tower over there. You're the young lady's bodyguard, right? Then you'd better get there as soon as
possible.

33995.<icon_exc>「おっ 聞こえたかい？ ひづめの音だ。\n どうやら 誰か来:
<icon_exc>Whoa, did you hear that? The sound of hooves. Looks
like someone's here.

33996.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ひゃーっ！\n:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>What is that girl with Azlantelope?
Who is that girl with Azlantelope now?
I'm so surprised!

33997.「おっと オレに なんか用かい？\n 悪いけど これから 風の町アズランに\n:
Oh, you wanted to see me? Sorry, but I'm about to leave for Wind Town Azlan. If I don't hurry, I'll miss the
first wind-sending ceremony in six years!

33998.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「アズランの風送:
I went to see the wind-sending ceremony at Azlan. Ojo-chan is one of the best wind riders of all time!
Well, did you see Taketora-sama? She was looking for you to thank you for saving her daughter.

33999.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「アズランの風送:
I went to see the wind-sending ceremony at Azlan. Ojo-chan is one of the best wind riders of all time! It's
a good thing I worked so hard to build the wind Reins!

47806.ひときわ大きい ヒスイのかたまりだ。:
It is a chunk of jade that is
exceptionally large.

47807.ひときわ大きい ヒスイのかたまりだ。\n<br>\nその周りに ひとつだけ\n色:
A large chunk of jade. Around it, I found only one jade of a different color. received Azure
Jade (Key Item)!

114696.「木工ギルドの 若い女マスター \n だれでもビビる ヤバい筋の借金取りを\n:
I heard that the young female master of the Woodworking Guild easily got rid of a debt collector who had a bad
reputation. I heard she's a very graceful young lady, but looks can be deceiving. I'd like to meet her.

71646.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「……美容院 サ:
Salon Fee Lycia will be opening all over the city soon. There will also be one in Royal City Kamiharmui down the
road. You'll only be alive long enough to try out different hairstyles. My advice, remember that. Hmm.

71647.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「……ぶつぶつ……私:
Bump I used to be a hairdresser at Salon Fe Lycia. I came to this land to create a beautiful new color with a
hint of darkness. I was attacked by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Suizen Marsh and I ran out of energy. Please, please,
please defeat the Kataki. Take back my Night Fog Ring from the beast!

71648.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「もし 引き受け:
I would have cursed you if you hadn't taken me on. Just kidding, thanks. The big bastard <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> should be
in the far east corner of Suizen Marsh. I'll wait here. I'll be waiting for you.

71649.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「……カタキを討:
You're going to avenge Kataki? But you have other people to take care of right now. Fine, I'll wait for you.
I'll wait for you forever and ever, and when you're free, come back and see me, please.

71650.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ゆ る さ な い:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>No yielding! Just kidding. I won't
curse you. You will definitely grant
my wish someday. Yes, I'm sure.

71651.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「美容院で使える 新:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I wanted to make a new color for
Salon. But <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> attacked
me and I ran out of energy.<open_irai><bw_break>

71652.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><close_i:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><close_irai>Please, please, please defeat Kataki.
Please take back my Night Fog Ring
from the evil <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>!

71653.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「……ふふ。見て:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Heh. I saw it. I saw you defeat the
evil <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and take back my
Night Fog Ring.

71654.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「……うそ つかない:
Don't lie. You have it, don't you? I've been waiting for you to give me the Night Fog Ring. I've been waiting
for you to give me the Night Fog Ring. Always, always, always, always, always.

71655.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「……ああ これ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Ah, here it is, my precious ring. Now
I can go back to Salon Fe Lycia.<bw_break>

71656.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><se_nots:
First, I removed the gemstone from the Night Fog Ring and broke it into pieces. The color is as nice as I
expected. Now all that's left is the magic.

71657.「マジカル……マジカル…… \n ラミマス ラミマス……\n ……ウ ラ ミ マ:
Magical Magical La Mimas La Mimas La
Mimas U La Mimas ~!

71658.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「……ああ でき:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Ah, it's done. Let's call it Salon's
new mist gray, the best, darkest, most
beautiful color.

71659.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「これで もう:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Now I have no more regrets. I can go
back to Salon Fee Lycia with my heart
open. Thank you.

71660.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「この ミストグ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>This mist gray color can be used
anywhere in Salon. Try it while
remembering me.<bw_break>

71661.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「……え？ どう:
What? Why can't I disappear after I got my wish? Oh no, I'm not dead. I was fired from Salon Fe Lycia a while
ago, and I thought that if I made a new color, I might be able to go back to the salon. But on my way back to
the salon after getting the Night Fog Ring, the material for the new color, I was attacked by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and
I fainted.

71662.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「……ふふ。あな:
Hmm. I'm so grateful to you. I will never, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever be
grateful.

71663.ヒガンに\n夜霧の指輪を 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><break:

71666.美容院で 新しい色\n『ミストグレー』が 使えるようになった！<me 71>:

71667.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私……昔から:
I was always too gloomy. I wanted to change that, so I became a hair stylist. But I got complaints from
customers and was fired. But thanks to you, I can go back to Salon Fe Lycia. I can work as a hair stylist again.
Thank you. We'll always be friends. Always, always, always, always, don't ever let me down. Hmm.
